press_to_reload: Press %{pause_key} to reload config and restart.
hint.launch_options_ignored: Any modifications made to LAUNCH_OPTIONS will be ignored.
error.smtp_auth:
Invalid email address or app password
Check BOT.NOTIFICATION.EMAIL
Check BOT.NOTIFICATION.PASSWORD
For Gmail users, please refer to: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833
error.smtp_timeout: Invalid BOT.NOTIFICATION.SMTP_SERVER or connection timed out
error.discord_webhook:
BOT.NOTIFICATION.DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL is not set
To make a webhook, please refer to https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/228383668-Intro-to-Webhooks
prompt.enter_pid: Enter profile id to use, q to quit.
error.invalid_pid: Invalid profile id, please try again.
error.invalid_launch_options:
Invalid launch options: '%{options}'
These arguments are used for config override: '%{opts}'
window_mode_detected: Window mode detected. Don't move the game window
supported_window_size: Supported window size. Don't change the game window size
error.mode_unsupported_size: Fishing mode '%{mode}' doesn't support window size '%{size}'
warning.unsupported_window_size:
Unsupported window size '%{size}'
Supported window size: '2560x1440', '1920x1080' or '1600x900'
Will search the image on the screen instead of the game window
error.features_disabled:
Snag detection will be disabled
Spooling detection will be disabled
Auto friction brake will be disabled
info.favorites_reminder: Some features require you to add the item to your favorites, make sure you have done so
warning.miaotixing_no_image: Miaotixing doesn't support image message, no screenshot will be sent
warning.default_retrieval: Default retrieval detection mode detected, fully spool your reel
craft.warning_ban: This might get you banned, use at your own risk
craft.warning_macros: Use Razor or Logitech macros instead
craft.make_not_found: Make button not found, please set the interface scale to 1x or move your mouse around
calculate.commands:
Commands:
r: Restart
s: Skip a part
S: Skip the remaining parts
p: Use previous value for a part
P: Use previous value for the remaing parts
q: Quit
calculate.hint: Press V and click the gear icon to view the parts.
fb.press_to_reset_quit: Press %{reset_key} to reset friction brake, %{quit_key} to quit.
fb.window_mode_detected: Window mode detected. don't move the game window
fb.supported_window_size: Supported window size. Don't change the game window size
fb.error.window_mode: Window mode must be "Borderless windowed" or "Window mode"
